Package com.behreajj.camzup.core

Class CurveEntity3

java.lang.Object
com.behreajj.camzup.core.Entity
com.behreajj.camzup.core.Entity3
com.behreajj.camzup.core.CurveEntity3
All Implemented Interfaces:
IOriented3, ISpatial3, IVolume, IVolume3, Comparable<Entity3>, Iterable<Curve3>
public class CurveEntity3 extends Entity3 implements Iterable<Curve3>, IVolume3
An entity which contains a transform that is applied to a list of curves.

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    final ArrayList<Curve3>

  • Method Details

    • eval

      public static Knot3 eval(CurveEntity3 ce, int curveIndex, float step, Knot3 knWorld, Knot3 knLocal)
      Evaluates a step in the range [0.0, 1.0] for a curve in the entity, returning a knot.
      Parameters:
      ce - the curve entity
      curveIndex - the curve index
      step - the step
      knWorld - the knot in world space
      knLocal - the knot in local space
      Returns:
      the world knot
      See Also:
      • Curve3.eval(Curve3, float, Vec3, Vec3)
      • Transform3.mulPoint(Transform3, Vec3, Vec3)

    • eval

      public static Ray3 eval(CurveEntity3 ce, int curveIndex, float step, Ray3 rayWorld, Ray3 rayLocal)
      Evaluates a step in the range [0.0, 1.0] for a curve in the entity, returning a coordinate on the curve and a tangent. The tangent will be normalized, to be of unit length.
      Parameters:
      ce - the curve entity
      curveIndex - the curve index
      step - the step
      rayWorld - the output world ray
      rayLocal - the output local ray
      Returns:
      the world ray
      See Also:
      • eval(CurveEntity3, int, float, Vec3, Vec3, Vec3, Vec3)

    • eval

      public static Vec3 eval(CurveEntity3 ce, int curveIndex, float step, Vec3 coWorld, Vec3 tnWorld, Vec3 coLocal, Vec3 tnLocal)
      Evaluates a step in the range [0.0, 1.0] for a curve in the entity, returning a coordinate on the curve and a tangent. The tangent will be normalized, to be of unit length.
      Parameters:
      ce - the curve entity
      curveIndex - the curve index
      step - the step
      coWorld - the output world coordinate
      tnWorld - the output world tangent
      coLocal - the output local coordinate
      tnLocal - the output local tangent
      Returns:
      the world coordinate
      See Also:
      • Curve3.eval(Curve3, float, Vec3, Vec3)
      • Transform3.mulPoint(Transform3, Vec3, Vec3)
      • Transform3.mulDir(Transform3, Vec3, Vec3)

    • reframe

      public CurveEntity3 reframe()
      Centers and rescales all curves in the entity about a shared origin by calculating their dimensions, subtracting the center point, and scaling by the maximum dimension.
      Returns:
      this curve entity.
      See Also:
      • Curve3.accumMinMax(Curve3, Vec3, Vec3)

    • relocateKnot

      public CurveEntity3 relocateKnot(int curveIndex, int knotIndex, Vec3 global, Vec3 local)
      Relocates a knot within the curve to a point in global space. The point is inverse multiplied by the transform to put it in local space.
      Parameters:
      curveIndex - the curve index
      knotIndex - the knot index
      global - the point in global space
      local - the point in curve local space
      Returns:
      this entity
      See Also:
      • Transform3.invMulPoint(Transform3, Vec3, Vec3)
      • Curve3.relocateKnot(int, Vec3)

      Removes a curve from this curve entity. Returns true if this request was filled, false if not.

    • setKnotCoord

      public CurveEntity3 setKnotCoord(int curveIndex, int knotIndex, Vec3 global, Vec3 local)
      Sets the coordinate of a knot for a given curve at an index. Multiplies the input coordinate in global space by the transform's inverse.

      To facilitate editing the curve with a graphical user interface (GUI).
      Parameters:
      curveIndex - the curve index
      knotIndex - the knot index
      global - the point in global space
      local - the point in curve local space
      Returns:
      this entity
      See Also:
      • Transform3.invMulPoint(Transform3, Vec3, Vec3)

    • setKnotForeHandle

      public CurveEntity3 setKnotForeHandle(int curveIndex, int knotIndex, Vec3 global, Vec3 local)
      Sets the fore handle of a knot for a given curve at an index. Multiplies the input coordinate in global space by the transform's inverse.

      To facilitate editing the curve with a graphical user interface (GUI).
      Parameters:
      curveIndex - the curve index
      knotIndex - the knot index
      global - the point in global space
      local - the point in curve local space
      Returns:
      this entity
      See Also:
      • Transform3.invMulPoint(Transform3, Vec3, Vec3)

    • setKnotRearHandle

      public CurveEntity3 setKnotRearHandle(int curveIndex, int knotIndex, Vec3 global, Vec3 local)
      Sets the rear handle of a knot for a given curve at an index. Multiplies the input coordinate in global space by the transform's inverse.

      To facilitate editing the curve with a graphical user interface (GUI).
      Parameters:

      knotIndex - the knot index
      global - the point in global space
      local - the point in curve local space
      Returns:
      this entity

    • toBlenderCode

      public String toBlenderCode()
      Returns a String of Python code targeted toward the Blender 4.x API. This code is brittle and is used for internal testing purposes, i.e., to compare how curve geometry looks in Blender (the control) versus in the library (the test).
      Returns:
      the string

    • toBlenderCode

      public String toBlenderCode(int uRes, String fillMode, float extrude, float bevelDepth)
      Returns a String of Python code targeted toward the Blender 4.x API. This code is brittle and is used for internal testing purposes, i.e., to compare how curve geometry looks in Blender (the control) versus in the library (the test).
      Parameters:
      uRes - the resolution u
      fillMode - the fill mode: "FULL", "BACK", "FRONT", "HALF"
      extrude - geometry extrusion amount
      bevelDepth - depth of geometry extrusion bevel
      Returns:
      the string

    • toOrigin

      public CurveEntity3 toOrigin()
      Centers all curves in the entity about a shared origin by calculating their dimensions then subtracting the center point.
      Returns:
      this curve entity.
